readingMnemonic: The reason the sheep feels such <kanji>envy</kanji> and <kanji>jealousy</kanji> is that the next creature is a <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん)! Who wouldn't be jealous of a creature as noble as a centaur?
meaningMnemonic: <radical>Sheep</radical> are always looking at the <radical>next</radical> animal, full of <kanji>envy</kanji> and <kanji>jealousy</kanji>.
